channel.title: Blue October
channel.description:
My new favorite band, recommended to me by girlfriend. We went to their concert in Mt. Clemens on the 9th, it was amazing! The Parlotones from South Africa started the concert, they were okay. A lot of their songs deal with mental health, and I can honestly say I'm addicted. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VPYhpSfuvIM Retarded Disfigured Clown - A poem by them, I like it very much. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wkx81j_Slz8 My favorite song by them, Schizophrenia. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuzEcmGzX_s My other favorite song by them, Jump Rope.
Amazing band.

item.title: Blue October
item.dc:creator: @Unlimited1 .Unlimited
item.description:
@Unlimited1 wrote:

I really like their Foiled album.

My favorite songs are Calling You, Into the Ocean, X Amount of Words and Drilled a Wire Through My Cheek
